title: Readout of the President's Call with General David Petraeus | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 31, 2011

 



Readout of the President's Call with General David Petraeus





	President Obama called General David Petraeus today on the occasion of his retirement from the U.S. military. President Obama congratulated General Petraeus on an historic career of service in the United States Army, including extraordinary contributions to our national security in Iraq and Afghanistan. The President also welcomed General Petraeusâ€™ continued commitment to public service as he prepares to take on his new role as Director of the Central Intelligence Agency.
